description: HVDC 통합 온톨로지·매핑 규칙 v2.8.3 (Flow Code 6·NULL Pkg·중복 제거·Pre Arrival KPI 필터 추가) - MACHO-GPT v3.4-mini 확장

sparql_templates.monthly_warehouse_summary: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?month ?warehouse (SUM(?amount) AS ?totalAmount) (SUM(?qty) AS ?totalQty) WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasLocation ?warehouse ; ex:hasDate ?date ; ex:hasAmount ?amount ; ex:hasQuantity ?qty . BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?date), 1, 7) AS ?month) } GROUP BY ?month ?warehouse ORDER BY ?month ?warehouse
sparql_templates.vendor_analysis: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?vendor (SUM(?amount) AS ?totalAmount) (COUNT(?event) AS ?eventCount) WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasVendor ?vendor ; ex:hasAmount ?amount . } GROUP BY ?vendor ORDER BY DESC(?totalAmount)
sparql_templates.container_summary: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?warehouse (SUM(?container20) AS ?total20FT) (SUM(?container40) AS ?total40FT) WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasLocation ?warehouse ; ex:has20FTContainer ?container20 ; ex:has40FTContainer ?container40 . } GROUP BY ?warehouse ORDER BY ?warehouse
sparql_templates.handling_fee_analysis: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?month ?warehouse (SUM(?handlingFee) AS ?totalHandlingFee) WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasLocation ?warehouse ; ex:hasDate ?date ; ex:hasHandlingFee ?handlingFee . BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?date), 1, 7) AS ?month) } GROUP BY ?month ?warehouse ORDER BY ?month ?warehouse
sparql_templates.logistics_flow_analysis: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?flowCode ?flowDefinition (COUNT(?event) AS ?eventCount) (SUM(?amount) AS ?totalAmount) WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasLogisticsFlowCode ?flowCode . BIND(IF(?flowCode = 0, "Pre Arrival", IF(?flowCode = 1, "Port→Site", IF(?flowCode = 2, "Port→WH→Site", IF(?flowCode = 3, "Port→WH→MOSB→Site", "Port→WH→wh→MOSB→Site")))) AS ?flowDefinition) } GROUP BY ?flowCode ?flowDefinition ORDER BY ?flowCode
sparql_templates.pre_arrival_items: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?event ?case ?location ?qty ?amount WHERE { ?event rdf:type ex:TransportEvent ; ex:hasLogisticsFlowCode 0 ; ex:hasCase ?case ; ex:hasLocation ?location ; ex:hasQuantity ?qty ; ex:hasAmount ?amount . } ORDER BY ?case
sparql_templates.invoice_charge_analysis: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?invoice ?documentRef ?chargeDescription (SUM(?rateUSD) AS ?totalRate) (SUM(?totalUSD) AS ?grandTotal) WHERE { ?invoice rdf:type ex:Invoice ; ex:hasDocumentRef ?documentRef ; ex:hasChargeDescription ?chargeDescription ; ex:hasRateUSD ?rateUSD ; ex:hasTotalUSD ?totalUSD . } GROUP BY ?invoice ?documentRef ?chargeDescription ORDER BY DESC(?grandTotal)
sparql_templates.shipping_document_summary: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?documentRef ?shippingNumber ?jobNumber ?customerID (COUNT(?charge) AS ?chargeCount) (SUM(?totalUSD) AS ?documentTotal) WHERE { ?doc rdf:type ex:ShippingDocument ; ex:hasDocumentRef ?documentRef ; ex:hasShippingNumber ?shippingNumber ; ex:hasJobNumber ?jobNumber ; ex:hasCustomerID ?customerID . ?charge ex:hasDocumentRef ?documentRef ; ex:hasTotalUSD ?totalUSD . } GROUP BY ?documentRef ?shippingNumber ?jobNumber ?customerID ORDER BY DESC(?documentTotal)
sparql_templates.charge_verification_status: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?verificationStatus (COUNT(?charge) AS ?chargeCount) (SUM(?totalUSD) AS ?statusTotal) WHERE { ?charge rdf:type ex:InvoiceLineItem ; ex:hasVerificationStatus ?verificationStatus ; ex:hasTotalUSD ?totalUSD . } GROUP BY ?verificationStatus ORDER BY DESC(?statusTotal)
sparql_templates.monthly_invoice_summary: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?month ?documentRef (SUM(?customsFee) AS ?totalCustoms) (SUM(?doFee) AS ?totalDO) (SUM(?phcFee) AS ?totalPHC) (SUM(?inlandFee) AS ?totalInland) (SUM(?totalAmount) AS ?monthlyTotal) WHERE { ?summary rdf:type ex:ChargeSummary ; ex:hasInvoiceDate ?date ; ex:hasDocumentRef ?documentRef ; ex:hasCustomsClearanceFee ?customsFee ; ex:hasDOFee ?doFee ; ex:hasPortHandlingCharge ?phcFee ; ex:hasInlandTruckingCharge ?inlandFee ; ex:hasTotalAmount ?totalAmount . BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?date), 1, 7) AS ?month) } GROUP BY ?month ?documentRef ORDER BY ?month ?documentRef
sparql_templates.rate_source_analysis: PREFIX ex: <{namespace}> SELECT ?rateSource (COUNT(?charge) AS ?chargeCount) (AVG(?rateUSD) AS ?avgRate) (SUM(?totalUSD) AS ?sourceTotal) WHERE { ?charge rdf:type ex:InvoiceLineItem ; ex:hasRateSource ?rateSource ; ex:hasRateUSD ?rateUSD ; ex:hasTotalUSD ?totalUSD . } GROUP BY ?rateSource ORDER BY DESC(?sourceTotal)

extension_guide.new_field_adding: field_map과 property_mappings에 한 줄 추가하면 자동으로 모든 리포트/RDF/쿼리에 반영됨
extension_guide.new_vendor_adding: vendor_mappings에 추가하면 자동으로 벤더 정규화에 반영됨
extension_guide.new_container_adding: container_column_groups에 추가하면 자동으로 컨테이너 표준화에 반영됨
extension_guide.new_sparql_template: sparql_templates에 추가하면 자동으로 쿼리 생성에 반영됨
extension_guide.new_warehouse_type: warehouse_classification에 추가하면 자동으로 창고 분류에 반영됨

v28_features.offshore_base_support: MOSB 등 해상 기지 완전 지원

v283_features.pre_arrival_kpi_filter: KPI 집계 시 Pre Arrival 항목 선택적 제외
